title: What subjects come under interdisciplinary? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pretty much any complex issue that translates to a society. There’s probably more that don’t fit this all-encompassing answer, but I think it’s accurate. I say that because addressing a subject like climate change requires an interdisciplinary approach. Climate change involves policy, oceanographers, public health professionals, physicians, nurses, and many other professionals because our environment affects pretty much everything we do. Another example is public policy. To address our country’s public transit issue within our localities, state, and national levels, we need a collaborative team of economists, policy-analysts, epidemiologists (health improvements and justification), health behaviorists (to see the likelihood of usage), environmental engineers, an architect, and many other professionals to create a sustainable system that will last for centuries by way of upkeep.
